product_name: Exotac CandleTin Hot Burn Survival Candle
long_description: Be prepared for an unplanned night out in the woods with the Exotac CandleTin(TM) Hot Burn Survival candle. It can be used to dry out tinder, provide warmth or even boil water. 100% beeswax candle features 3 wicks that can all be lit for maximum heat output; light only 1 or 2 wicks for less heat output and longer burn times. Exotac CandleTin(TM) Hot Burn Survival candle will boil 8 fl. oz. of water in about 18 min. Candle is available in 2 sizes: Small and Large. Light all 3 wicks on the Large candle and it will burn for about 2 hrs.; light only 1 wick and it will burn for about 15 hrs. Light all 3 wicks on the Small candle and it will burn for about 1 hr.; light only 1 wick and it will burn for about 6 hrs. Use caution when burning all 3 wicks as the tin will become hot to the touch.
